ctx: intros d a pl c tl H3 H4.
exceptions.tactic: apply H1 with d a pl c tl in H3 as H5.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) m -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl m) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d m (app c tl)" on hypothesis of type "mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M2 prec_list m m0)".

ctx: intros d a pl c tl H3 H4.
exceptions.tactic: apply H2 with d a pl c tl in H4 as H6.
exceptions.exn: Unable to apply lemma of type "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) m0 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl m0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d m0 (app c tl)" on hypothesis of type "state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M2 prec_list m m0)) (app c tl)".

ctx: intros d a pl c tl H3 H4.
exceptions.exn: In environment m : state H1 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) m -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl m) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d m (app c tl) m0 : state H2 : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) m0 -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl m0) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d m0 (app c tl) d : preDTA a : ad pl : prec_list c : ad tl : term_list H3 : mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M2 prec_list m m0) H4 : state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M2 prec_list m m0)) (app c tl) Unable to unify "forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (pl : prec_list) (c : ad) (tl : term_list), mpl_compat (M1 prec_list a pl) (M1 prec_list ?M1851 ?M1852) -> state_reconnait d (union_mpl_0 a pl (M1 prec_list ?M1851 ?M1852)) (app c tl) -> state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list ?M1851 ?M1852) (app c tl)" with "state_reconnait d (M1 prec_list a pl) (app c tl) \\/ state_reconnait d (M2 prec_list m m0) (app c tl)".

original: intros m H1 m0 H2. unfold union_s_rpl_def in *. intros d a pl c tl H3 H4. apply H1 with d a pl c tl in H3 as H5. apply H2 with d a pl c tl in H4 as H6. apply union_s_rpl_1. apply H5. apply H6.
